item.description: Research Interests Computer architecture Processor design: Performance and security About    Dr. Lutan Zhaoâ€™s received the BE degree from the School of Electrical Engineering and Automation, Henan Polytechnic University in 2014 and the ME degree from the School of Electronic Engineering, University Of Electronic Science and Technology of China in 2017. He is a doctoral candidate at the State Key Laboratory of Information Security, Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China.
